ai-tha-ap325:1.2_0: seeing the Teacher of the sword,
ai-tha-ap325:1.3_0: raising his hands in respectful salutation,
ai-tha-ap325:2.1_0: after seeing (her), he said this to Mahāpajāpatī Gotamī:
ai-tha-ap325:2.3_0: raising his hands in respectful salutation,
ai-tha-ap325:2.4_0: converted my mind to confidence in him.
ai-tha-ap325:3.3_0: I’m not aware of any living creatures.
ai-tha-ap325:3.4_0: this fruit is the perception of the Buddha.
ai-tha-ap325:5.1_0: That is how these verses were recited by the senior venerable Purindivaccha.
ai-tha-ap325:6.1_0: Third: the third Council of the Elder Nun
